snippet: The White House press secretary said Donald J. Trump’s call to bar Muslims from entering the United States disqualified him from the presidency and called on the other Republican presidential candidates to repudiate his candidacy or be excluded as...
abstract: The White House press secretary said Donald J. Trump’s call to bar Muslims from entering the United States disqualified him from the presidency and called on the other Republican presidential candidates to repudiate his candidacy or be excluded as well.

headline.main: White House Says Donald Trump’s Muslim Proposal Disqualifies Him for President
